org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowMediaRecorder

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMediaRecorder

@Implements(value=android.media.MediaRecorder.class)
public class ShadowMediaRecorder
extends Object

Shadows the MediaRecorder class.
